metadata.synopsis: Single dialog for one of the guards in front of the Private Room. Only if the other guard is defeated.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Kill or knock-out the guard S_LOW_Elfsong_FlamingFist_002_971f5890-e0ae-49ef-9a04-5e69ebdf8159 and later make click on S_LOW_Elfsong_FlamingFist_001_990ad029-d291-4788-86f9-dfceacdf771c

0.speaker: Fist Rusk
0.text: Beat it, I said. No more warnings.

1.speaker: Fist Rusk
1.text: Move quickly and I'll let you go, stranger. We've had enough trouble for one day.
